price: Na atakupeni mali na wana, na atakupeni mabustani na atakufanyieni mito.
arabic: وَيُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَٰلٖ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَٰرٗا
footnotes: Na atakupeni mali na wana, na hayo ndiyo mapambo ya dunia, na atakupeni mashamba mtayo starehea kwa uzuri wake na matunda yake, na atakujaalieni mito ya kunyweshea mazao yenu na mifugo yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayum'did'kum bi-amwālin wabanīna wayajʿal lakum jannātin wayajʿal lakum anhāran
